wikipedia_page.main: Harold Hanger (1886 – 23 March 1918) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre half.

link_mentions.page: List of Bradford City A.F.C. players
List of Crystal Palace F.C. players

response: O'Rourke added to his squad which finished the previous season with a string of victories by signing Scottish national goalkeeper Willie Muir from Dundee, centre forward Sam Higginson from Reading and left half Harry Hanger from Kettering Town.
